response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. Our esteemed company has developed a unique product that we believe would significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. We understand its worth to you is approximately $1,000,000. Considering the exceptional quality and potential impact on your endeavors, we propose to offer this product to you at a special price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant saving compared to the market value. We are confident that this investment will yield substantial returns and contribute to your long-term success. Should you require any further information or wish to discuss this proposal in detail, please do not hesitate to contact us. We look forward to the possibility of collaborating with you.", "product_price": 950000}
